descriptionMdByRank.1: When Counter Attack is released, restores HP by **1.6%**. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 6s.
descriptionMdByRank.2: When Counter Attack is released, restores HP by **2%**. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 6s.
descriptionMdByRank.3: When Counter Attack is released, restores HP by **2.4%**. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 6s.
descriptionMdByRank.4: When Counter Attack is released, restores HP by **2.8%**. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 6s.
descriptionMdByRank.5: When Counter Attack is released, restores HP by **3.2%**. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 6s.
